rows.label: qev096102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Commander Vandham told me you'd be stopping by
to take the Skell license exam.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0002
rows.name:
Do you have your certifications from the eight
proficiency exams?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Yep, looks like a full set. Nice work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0004
rows.name: We're ready for the final exam.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0005
rows.name: No need to stress, though. It's a simple verbal quiz.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0006
rows.name:
We had you run missions for each of the eight
divisions, and there's a reason for that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0007
rows.name: Care to guess what it might be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0010
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0011
rows.name:
Say that it was to better understand the
role each division plays within BLADE.

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0020
rows.name: Joke

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that it was Vandham's way of hazing you.

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0008
rows.name:
Exactly! Now you've got a feel for each one's particular
flavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0009
rows.name:
Hopefully that's given you a few ideas of how you can
put a Skell to use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0010
rows.name:
Heh. Believe me, he's put me through plenty—
but it wasn't just spite that motivated this call.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0011
rows.name:
I expect those missions have given you a feel for each
division's particular flavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0012
rows.name:
Hopefully that's given you a few ideas of how you can
put a Skell to use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0013
rows.name: Anyway, that's one reason. But there's another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0014
rows.name:
There aren't exactly enough Skells to go around all of
the divisions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0015
rows.name:
Sometimes situations arise where people have to cross
division lines and cooperate to get things done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0016
rows.name:
For efficiency's sake, it's important that everyone knows
how the other divisions work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0017
rows.name: Make sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod in understanding.

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0041
rows.name: Shake your head in confusion.

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0018
rows.name: Hmm. Guess I wasn't very clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0019
rows.name: I'll try again. We can keep going over it till it clicks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0020
rows.name:
Better that than letting a BLADE run wild in a Skell
without understanding what it means.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0021
rows.name:
Each of the eight divisions has its own characteristic
traits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0022
rows.name:
You should have gotten a feel for that over the course
of those tests—the types of work they do and the role
they serve in New LA are all different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0023
rows.name: And each uses Skells differently as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0024
rows.name:
Keep that in mind when deciding how to put yours to
productive use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0025
rows.name: Oh, and one more thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0026
rows.name: There's a limit to the number of Skells we've got.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0027
rows.name:
Sometimes we need to pool those resources and work
together to get things done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0028
rows.name:
Knowing everyone's role is crucial to making such joint
operations run smoothly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0029
rows.name: Clearer now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod in understanding.

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0061
rows.name: Say you're still confused.

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0030
rows.name:
Good. Then you are now cleared to own and operate
a Skell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0031
rows.name: I'll authorize your license now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0032
rows.name:
I also get to share some good news—looks like you're
being given a free Skell, compliments of Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0033
rows.name:
It's parked in the hangar in the back.
Go introduce yourself and give it a test ride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0070
rows.name: Thank

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Walter how much you appreciate his help.

rows.label: qev096102_JNK0080
rows.name: Provoke

rows.label: qev096102_SEL0081
rows.name: Demand that everyone on your team receive a free Skell.

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0034
rows.name:
Just doing my own job. Really, Vandham is the one
you should be thanking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0035
rows.name:
He must expect big things from you—it's a rare day a
rookie pilot gets issued a Skell free of charge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0036
rows.name: I look forward to seeing what you do with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0037
rows.name: ...Wow. You've got brass, I'll give you that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0038
rows.name:
Commander Vandham paid for that Skell out of his
own private funds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0039
rows.name: And you're going to go and ask for... Just...wow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0040
rows.name:
Yeah, I don't think I'm comfortable issuing a license to
someone who can't appreciate the kindness of others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0041
rows.name: Retest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0042
rows.name: You'll start the whole process over from the beginning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0043
rows.name:
Er, no. That's too easy. I'm adding a hundred hours of
mandatory classroom training on top of it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0044
rows.name: ...Is what I SHOULD say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0045
rows.name:
Seriously, though, if the commander heard you he'd
be crying right now. And is that what you want?
Big salty Vandham tears all over the place?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0046
rows.name:
All right. If you've learned your lesson, go take your
Skell for a ride. Commander Vandham and I both are
expecting great things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0047
rows.name:
Go become an ace pilot and make yourself useful to
BLADE, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096102_MSG0048
rows.name:
Head on back in the hangar. I'm sure your Skell is
dying to meet its new owner.[ST:wait ]
